Package io.mrshannon.hexmek.models

Interface FiringStrategy

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClusterFiringStrategy, NormalFiringStrategy
    public interface FiringStrategy
    A firing strategy is used to allow some weapons to be single shot and others to fire in clusters.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      List<DamageRecord> fire​(Weapon weapon, Unit target, int modifiers)
      Fire the weapon from one unit to another.
      int getDamage()
      Get the maximum amount of damage that can be inflicted.
      double getHitChance​(int modifiers)
      Get the chance that the shot will hit.

    • Method Detail

      • getDamage

        int getDamage()
        Get the maximum amount of damage that can be inflicted.
        Returns:
        maximum possible damage

      • getHitChance

        double getHitChance​(int modifiers)
        Get the chance that the shot will hit. This is the chance of at least one shot hitting for cluster weapons.
        Parameters:
        modifiers - sum of all modifiers (gunnery, attack, and to hit)
        Returns:
        percentage chance to hit with the given modifiers

      • fire

        List<DamageRecord> fire​(Weapon weapon,
                        Unit target,
                        int modifiers)
        Fire the weapon from one unit to another.
        Parameters:
        weapon - weapon to fire
        target - target unit
        modifiers - sum of all modifiers (gunnery, attack, and to hit)
        Returns:
        list of damage records, will only have one element for non cluster (normal) firing strategy
